review_content:
More Hype Than Quality! Skip buying this griddle.: Purchased a Blackstone Griddle, model 2355, on the Friday evening before Memorial Day weekend 2024. Assembled the next day and attempted to register this unit for warranty online.  Before I completed the assembly, I noticed two significant problems. First, the paint finish on the lid portion was defective with an area that did not get painted. Not only is this very unsightly, but you can bet my new griddle will be rusting on the lid within days of me placing it outside.
The second and even more ...[Rating - 1/5]

review_content: Good product but beware!: I love the grill itself. But the knobs do not fit correctly.  But I had already seasoned the grill top before realizing the knobs just won't work.   So now I have to slide the knobs off to to turn the valves on then put the knobs back on to control the heat levels.   It recommends replacing the valves when the knobs don't fit but I am not buying more parts when I just bought the grill plus the valves work fine. The knobs are just defective.[Rating - 3/5]
